conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation confirmed with visible wall depth and isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall height and thickness; clear interior volume and clean cutaway geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to layout; minor text-related labels transposed (BED-2 labeled as BED-1 in render) but geometry is accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Complete furniture matching; bathroom and kitchen fixtures accurately placed according to plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean, but text labels from the 2D plan were baked into the 3D floor materials, reducing presentation points.

detected_errors.description: Original text labels and dimension lines are baked/rendered directly onto the floor surfaces.
Label error in render consistently names both bedrooms as 'BED-1'.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains exact geometric proportions and furniture placement of the original floor plan.
